```go
package main

import (
	"github.com/pulumi/pulumi-aws/sdk/v6/go/aws/ecr"
	"github.com/pulumi/pulumi/sdk/v3/go/pulumi"
)

func main() {
	pulumi.Run(func(ctx *pulumi.Context) error {
		_, err := ecr.NewRepository(ctx, "foo", &ecr.RepositoryArgs{
			ImageScanningConfiguration: &ecr.RepositoryImageScanningConfigurationArgs{
				ScanOnPush: pulumi.Bool(true),
			},
			ImageTagMutability: pulumi.String("MUTABLE"),
		})
		if err != nil {
			return err
		}
		return nil
	})
}
```

</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">

</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>The tag mutability setting for the repository. Must be one of: <code>MUTABLE</code> or <code>IMMUTABLE</code>. Defaults to <code>MUTABLE</code>.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional property-replacement"

## Look up Existing Repository Resource {#look-up}

## Supporting Types



<h4 id="repositoryencryptionconfiguration">Repository<wbr>Encryption<wbr>Configuration</h4>

<div>
<pulumi-choosable type="language" values="csharp">
<dl class="resources-properties"><dt class="property-optional property-replacement"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="encryptiontype_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#encryptiontype_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Encryption<wbr>Type</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>The encryption type to use for the repository. Valid values are <code>AES256</code> or <code>KMS</code>. Defaults to <code>AES256</code>.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional property-replacement"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="kmskey_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#kmskey_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Kms<wbr>Key</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>The ARN of the KMS key to use when <code>encryption_type</code> is <code>KMS</code>. If not specified, uses the default AWS managed key for ECR.</p>
</dd></dl>
</pulumi-choosable>
</div>

## Import



Using `pulumi import`, import ECR Repositories using the `name`. For example:

```sh
 $ pulumi import aws:ecr/repository:Repository service test-service
```
